descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]ENB alternative: Floyd's Sweetfx Profile[/size][/center]


[center][size=4]English (FR plus Bas):[/size][/center]
[size=3]
Originally, I’ve created this profile for my tutorial video series « How to mod skyrim from A to Z », in the video ENB alternative, but people asked me to upload it, so here we are

The purpose of this video was to allow to the person who doesn’t want or can’t use an enb to include some of the ENB enhancement without loosing too much fps.
I can’t guarantee the behavior or this profile on every system, it depends of the mod you installed. On the screenshots and on the video, I used RLO, climate of tamriel and pure waters.


To install it you need first to download sweetfx here:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23364/?] Sweetfx  [/url]

Then uncompress the sweetfx archive

Copy/paste the content in the skyrim folder (not the data folder), the folder where you can find TESV.exe.

Go to files, download my profile, and uncompress it, then copy/past the sweetfx_settings.txt into the skyrim folder and its done.

[/size][center][size=3]In this video, go to 3.32 to see what the effects of the settings are, step by step,.[/size]


[youtube]gu_FiiOyJc4[/youtube][/center]
[line]

[center][size=4]Français[/size][/center]

[size=3]Voici  le profile sweetfx concocté par mes soins pour la série de vidéo « Modez Skyrim de A à Z : Alternative aux ENB.
Toutes les infos, démonstrations des différents effets ainsi que la procédure d’installation sont décrites dans la vidéo.
Il vous suffit de télécharger le fichier dans l’onglet files, de le décompresser dans votre dossier skyrim comme n’importe quel profil décrit dans cette vidéo.
[/size]


[line]


[color=#ffff00] [size=5]Bon Jeu! [/size][/color]
author: Floyd2099
